src:
Niz nogometnih ulovov se nadaljuje
Draga okrepitev Reala Luka Jović le dosegel prvi gol za kraljevi klub. Zadel je tudi zunaj igrišča, mater svojega otroka je zamenjal za manekenko.
02 Nov 2019, 07:15 by M. U.









Luka Jović, ki prisega le na madridski Real, je Anđelo Manitašević, levo, zamenjal za Sofijo Milošević. FOTO: instagram


MADRID – Pri nogometaših je pač težava, da imajo preveč denarja, ta že v veliki meri prinaša svobodo, (r)evolucija pa je pač v glavi. Enaindvajsetletni srbski napadalec Luka Jović je poleti za 67 milijonov evrov iz frankfurtskega Eintrachta, bil je na posoji iz Benfice, prestopil v Real Madrid, a ima težave, da se za stalno prerine v začetno enajsterico trenerja Zinedina Zidana. V zadnjem krogu španskega prvenstva je v 69. minuti vstopil v igro in pri zmagi Reala nad Leganesom zabil svoj prvi gol za beli balet. Če na igrišču ne gre ravno po željah, gre pa pri lepšem spolu. Jović je zdaj zapustil Anđelo Manitašević, s katero je bil s prekinitvami pet let in ima z njo tudi sedemmesečnega sina Davida, in se povsem ogrel za srbsko manekenko Sofijo Milošević. Srbi celo pišejo, da je Miloševićeva njihova najlepša manekenka, sta pa z Jovićem do zdaj skrivala svojo zvezo. A ko sta



ljubezen in seks prišla na plan, se je javno oglasila tudi Manitaševićeva in navrgla, da ji je vseeno, s kom se videva njen žogobrcarski (nekdanji) partner. »Lahko počne, kar hoče. Najina zveza se je končala leta 2016. Lani sva se znova srečala in zagorela je stara strast. Zanosila sem nenačrtovano, ko se je to že zgodilo, pa sva se odločila za rojstvo otroka,« je izjavila. Sofija Milošević je bila že v zvezi z nogometaši Ademom Ljajićem, Duškom Tošićem in hrvaškim reprezentantom Antejem Rebićem. 


Luka Jović, ki prisega le na madridski Real, je Anđelo Manitašević, levo, zamenjal za Sofijo Milošević. FOTO: instagram
text:
The string of football catches continues
Dear Reinforcement Real Luka Jovic only scored the first goal for the royal club. He also hit off the field, replacing the mother of his baby as a model.
02 Nov 2019, 07:15 by M. U.









Luka Jovic, who only swears by Real Madrid, has replaced Angelo Manitasevic, left, with Sofia Milosevic. PHOTO: instagram


MADRID - The problem with football players is that they have too much money, and it already brings freedom to a great extent, and (r) evolution is in the head. Twenty-one-year-old Serbian striker Luka Jovic has forfeited € 67 million from Eintracht Frankfurt in the summer, transferred from Benfica, transferred to Real Madrid, but is having trouble breaking into the starting eleven of coach Zinedin Zidan. In the last round of the Spanish Championship, he entered the game in the 69th minute and scored his first white ballet goal in Real's victory over Leganes. If the pitch is not exactly what you want, but it is about a better sex. Jovic has now left Angela Manitasevic, with whom he has been intermittently for five years and also has a seven-month-old son, David, and has completely warmed up for Serbian model, Sofia Milosevic. The Serbs even say that Milosevic is their most beautiful model, and so far they have hidden their relationship with Jovic. But who are they



love and sex came to the fore, Manitasevic also publicly said that she did not care who her dating (former) partner was dating. “He can do whatever he wants. Our relationship ended in 2016. We met again last year and an old passion has ignited. I got pregnant unplanned, but when that happened, we decided to have a baby, "she said. Sofia Milosevic has already been in contact with football players Adem Ljajic, Dusko Tosic and Croatian national team player Ante Rebic.


Luka Jovic, who only swears by Real Madrid, has replaced Angelo Manitasevic, left, with Sofia Milosevic. PHOTO: instagram
